name: Lockwood Selector 3772 Universal Mortice Lock, 60mm BS, Satin Stainless
description: Lockwood SelectorÂ® 3772 universal mortice lock with configurable functions (including Escape, Passage, Combination). Features anti-lockout and selectable holdback. Zinc diecast body, stainless steel chassis and faceplate. Fire rated. Requires cylinder and door furniture.
standardized_function_description: Universal Mortice Lock - Configurable (e.g., Escape, Passage, Combination, Anti-Lockout, Holdback). Settings under faceplate.

certifications_and_standards.name: Fire Resistant Doorsets
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for fire door assemblies.
certifications_and_standards.product_compliance_notes: Successfully tested up to 4 hours on suitable fire door assemblies.

certifications_and_standards.name: Locksets and hardware for doors - Durability Rating D8
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for durability of mechanical elements (500,000 cycles).

certifications_and_standards.name: Locksets and hardware for doors - Security Rating S7
certifications_and_standards.product_compliance_notes: Conforms to S7 (Physical Security). Can be S8 with appropriate furniture and cylinder.

certifications_and_standards.name: Locksets and hardware for doors - Corrosion Resistance C6
certifications_and_standards.description_of_standard: Australian Standard for corrosion resistance (168 hours Neutral Salt Spray).

material_main: Zinc Alloy (Case), Stainless Steel (Chassis, Faceplate, Bolts)

ordering_info.notes_for_ordering: Universal lock with selectable functions (Passage, Combination, Escape, Anti-lockout, Holdback). Supplied less cylinder. Standard 60mm backset. For 89mm use 4772SS, for 127mm use 5772SS. Suits door thickness 32-50mm.

additional_attributes_raw.manufacturer_specific_notes: Easy Red/Green function setting under faceplate. 15mm stainless steel reversible latch bolt with deadlatching. Electric strike compatible. Supplied with Selector 'V' cam.

metadata.internal_notes: Populated for Lockwood 3772SS (60mm backset, Universal/Escape function capable). Confirm other available finishes for the 3772 base model to create separate SKUs if needed.
